name: Plonks (RuddyGoodProductions)
description:
Launch Your Plonks!

  • bite-size multiplayer party game
  • 1 - 6 players
  • more maps to come

Controls

  • this is a mouse free zone
  • use WASD as directional keys
  • hold space to increase your range and release to launch
  • holding either W or S during the launch will effect the angle
  • esc to quit or access the menu
  • f to toggle fullscreen

Game-A-Month-Athon 

This project was created as part of the Ruddy Good GAMA, where we've set out to create a bite-size experimental game each month! Might be a bit late but hope it payed off: August 2021.

Join on Patreon for a game a month and more!
